\textwidth\paperwidth

\textheight\paperheight

\renewcommand{\PostApport}{. }

\begin{document}
%% CV language selection: Spanish(ES),English(EN). 
\newtoggle{ES}
\newtoggle{EN}
\toggletrue{ES}
\togglefalse{EN}

%% CV positions: project coordination (CO), systems engineer(SYS) or software engineer (SOFT)
\newtoggle{CO}
\newtoggle{SYS}
\newtoggle{SOFT}
\togglefalse{CO}
\togglefalse{SYS}
\toggletrue{SOFT}
